home.subtitle: Building the future, one project at a time
home.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs

about.bio: I am an Informatics Engineering student with a strong interest in software development and data analysis. I have experience with programming languages such as PHP, HTML, and CSS, and exposure to both front-end and back-end development. Through organizational and committee involvement, I have developed project management, teamwork, and analytical skills that support my academic and professional growth.
goals: Build products that solve real-world problems

achievements: Top 9 Finalist â€“ FORPIS PMI East Java Coordinator Candidate (2022)

reflections.journey: My time at Universitas Airlangga has been transformative. From learning the fundamentals of programming to building complex applications, each project has taught me valuable lessons about problem-solving, teamwork, and perseverance. The challenges I've faced have shaped me into a more resilient and creative thinker.
reflections.challenges: Balancing multiple projects while maintaining academic excellence, learning new technologies independently, and collaborating effectively in team environments.
reflections.highlights: Successfully deploying my first full-stack application, presenting at university tech events, and mentoring junior students in programming fundamentals.
reflections.aspirations: I aim to continue growing as a developer, contribute to meaningful open-source projects, and eventually build technology solutions that positively impact my community.

projects.title: .feastion - Online Clothing Store (UAS UI)
projects.description: A simple e-commerce website for buying and selling clothes with product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout features.
projects.fullDescription: Developed as a final project for the User Interface (UI) course. This website is designed to make it easier for users to browse, select, and purchase clothing online. It includes product catalog, product details, shopping cart, and checkout simulation. The admin side allows product management through a simple dashboard.

projects.title: Meowsome - Cat Lovers Website (UTS UI)
projects.description: A website dedicated to cat lovers, featuring product collections, care guides, blogs, and community interaction.
projects.fullDescription: Developed as a midterm project (UTS) for the User Interface (UI) course. This website is designed for cat enthusiasts to explore collections of cat products, read care guides, enjoy fun cat blogs, and interact with the community. The goal is to provide a delightful and informative platform for cat lovers.

projects.title: K3Care - Occupational Safety & Health (Mobile App)
projects.description: Mobile app for workplace safety reporting, work hour reminders, and labor law regulations.
projects.fullDescription: Developed as a mobile application project focused on occupational safety and health (K3). The app allows workers to report workplace incidents, receive reminders for work and rest hours, and access labor law regulations. Built using Flutter and Dart, the app supports both Android and iOS platforms.
features: Work hour and break time reminders
Access to labor law and safety regulations

projects.title: OurCity - Regional Reporting Website (Framework)
projects.description: A web-based platform for reporting and monitoring regional issues and development progress.
projects.fullDescription: Developed as a collaborative group project, OurCity is a web-based reporting platform that enables citizens to report regional issues directly on an interactive map, such as damaged infrastructure (e.g., broken bridges, potholes). Administrators can submit project updates to inform the public about ongoing or completed regional development and repairs. The system enhances transparency and community participation in regional development.
features: User report submission with map integration
Photo and description upload for incidents
Interactive map to visualize reports and projects

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website (English Midterm Exam)
projects.description: A modern and responsive personal portfolio website showcasing my experiences, projects, and achievements.
projects.fullDescription: Developed a fully responsive personal portfolio website to present my background, experiences, and accomplishments in a professional and visually appealing way. The website features smooth navigation and a clean interface for an optimal user experience.
features: Responsive design for desktop and mobile devices
About, Resume, Projects, and Contact sections
Integrated contact form and social media links
